author: porttechnology.org
title: Hyster Announce Lift-Truck Merger
text:
Hyster, a world-wide lift-truck designer and manufacturer has announced the addition of Eastern Lift Truck Company, a recognised premier lift truck service provider with over 40 years of dedicated materials handling experience and equipment service, to its network of leading independent Hyster dealers, effective October 3, 2015. Eastern Lift Truck company is now the authorised and exclusive dealer of Hyster lift trucks, parts and service in certain areas of Delaware, Maryland (Cecil County only), New Jersey, New York and Pennsylvania.
Bob Sattler, Vice President of Dealer Development, said: “Their dedication to excellence and record of performance in the materials handling industry, should quickly translate into success as a Hyster dealer. This expansion is an example of how our network of valued and experienced independent dealers keeps getting stronger – an invaluable resource for Hyster customers to get what they need, when they need it.”
Fact File: With more than 700 employees at 15 locations, Eastern Lift Truck Company has the staff and support to provide parts, service, fleet management, rental equipment, sales, warehouse products and training expertise throughout the mid-Atlantic region.
Fact File: Hyster is a leading world-wide lift truck designer and manufacturer. Hyster offers 130 lift truck models configured for gasoline, LPG, diesel and electric power, with one of the widest capacity ranges in the industry — from 2,000 to 105,000 lbs.
